post.Title: Worry Free Home Buying - Some Tips to Avoid Buyer's Remorse
post.Content: So many things can go wrong when you move into a new home. We've owned seven houses, and there have always been surprises, even in the newer homes. The roof can need replacing, the foundation may need repair, the chimney may be blocked and crumbling, the pipes may be galvanized steel and need to be replaced with copper, the furnace or water heater can die, there may be unexpected assessments on the property, insect infestation, dry rot, wet rot, and in the worst of cases, houses literally start cracking and falling off the foundation and sliding down hills. While many safeguards have been put into place to catch some of these things, they are not foolproof. A few years ago, we had a case in our area where a house fell down a hill and pushed the house beneath it (which was on level ground) into Puget Sound. The family was sleeping at the time, and tragically, they all died. Yet, people continue to build on the edges of cliffs, in flood plains, and in our area, under a sleeping, yet potentially explosive volcano. Our homes, if we are lucky enough to have one, are the largest investment that we have, as well as a huge expenditure of time and money for upkeep. How much easier our lives are if we choose our dwelling wisely. It is so easy to be impressed with appearance, and neglect the basic structure. I've done it myself. When you are poor, you don't feel you have the money to hire an inspector to check out the things you don't know about. We bought one house in Arizona simply because it had a huge living room, which was very different from all the tiny rooms we had been looking at. We learned the hard way. The living room was large because the home had been modified. Our huge living room was made by taking out the original kitchen, and adding a new one. When they added the new kitchen to the house, they didn't know what they were doing. They neglected to put in the air pipes in the plumbing, so the sink constantly backed up. They used the wrong kind of plumbing, and where it joined the original plumbing in the house, water came running down the ceiling and walls. The new kitchen wouldn't cool properly, so we had to put a folding door between it and the main house. It got so hot in that kitchen during the summer, that every piece of plastic in that kitchen melted. We were too trusting, and too innocent. We were young. Never assume anything when you are buying a home. Never believe anything that is told to you by someone who has a vested interest in selling the house. If you are thinking of buying a home, make sure you have enough money for a home inspection as part of the transaction. A lot of people will not buy a house older than about 10 years. This is because it is a fairly safe bet that no serious damage can be done to a house in that amount of time, even if it is neglected. Some people will buy a new mobile home for this reason, if they cannot afford a newer frame house. When damage has been done to a house through neglect, some things can be repaired, other things will never be the same. The repairs will cost a lot of money. Give buying a home the research, time, and the diligence that it requires. Try not do make decisions based on emotion. Be careful, and you won't suffer buyer's remorse. About the Author: Nikki Willhite has been writing and publishing articles on the Internet on the topic of Frugal Living for over a decade. Visit her at http://www.frugalhappyfamilies.com, where you will find hundreds of frugal living tips and articles. Frugal Happy Families- more than just money! Article first published at http://www.allthingsfrugal.com

post.Title: How to Avoid Common Mistakes First-Time Home Buyers Make
post.Content: If you think you're ready to buy a house, that's great! Here's a short walkthrough of the common mistakes that first-time home buyers make which are not meant to cast a negative light on your plans but to help you put things into perspective. Make the most out of the time that you'll spend on the buying process by following a few simple tips to help you avoid first-time buyers' mistakes. 1. Going house shopping without checking your finances first. - If you don't know how much you can afford, chances are you'll spend a lot of time looking at houses you won't end up buying anyway. There's a lot of houses to choose from in any location, but focusing your search on a market where you'll most likely be able to afford will get you to your dream house faster. For example, if you want to buy Waxhaw real estate, it's best to know around what amount you can afford to spend on the house so that you'll spend more time going through Waxhaw homes for sale that you can actually consider buying. 2. Not getting preapproved for a mortgage. - Getting preapproved for a mortgage is not the same as getting approved for one. It's not really a firm guarantee, it's just something that can be a positive indication that when the time comes when you want to apply for a loan, you'll probably have a good chance of getting approved. What you know you can afford may not really coincide with the amount that lenders will be willing to lend you. In this sense, loan preapproval also gives you an idea of roughly how much money you can expect lenders to preapprove for you. 3. Forgetting all about closing costs. - Closing costs can really be an inconvenience if you're not ready for them. Ask a lender for any closing costs that you may need to prepare for or, if you really have no idea what this means, ask your real estate agent or make a quick search on the internet for what items you need to prepare for. 4. Compromising on and getting turned off by the wrong things. - There are things that you may be tempted to compromise with but will really put a strain on your future life in your future home. For example, you may be compromised to buy a house with only two rooms because of budgetary constraints. Sometimes this isn't realistic for some people. Like if you have five children and they're several years away from college (leaving home). It's better to either look around for a better house that fits your budget or save more money in order to be able to afford a better house. On the other hand, some people quickly turn down a house on the basis that they have to do a little bit of repainting or landscaping. These things can be done over a period of time after you buy the house, if it's not something you can do immediately after. Most houses will need to be fixed up a bit before you move in, anyway. 5. Not having the house inspected. - Unless you're an expert with the right equipment to do it, you need to get a house inspected. A general inspection will reveal some things you probably wouldn't have noticed, but a specialized inspection for mold, insects, toxic substances and the likes will prove to be very useful for you. There are a lot more mistakes that first-time home buyers are prone to make, but those above can start you off pretty well. Tito Alamo is a writer specializing in a wide assortment of topics. Among them, real estate. Learn more about how to find quality Waxhaw homes for sale online as well as find a great list of Waxhaw real estate articles on our website.

post.Title: First Time Home Buying Help
post.Content: Is it your first time buying a home? Well if it is you probably already know that it is a very scary thing to start to try to deal with. The main thing when buying a home is being prepared. You should have some knowledge before you begin negotiating. There are also many other things that you need to keep in mind while you are searching for your new home. But, the more that you know, it is more likely that you will end up with a great home at the end. When you are applying for a mortgage loan, do not just look at the things that will be impacting you immediately. Try to look into the future and see how much the final cost will be. Also, always read the fine print in the paperwork. There may be clauses and other things that change the conditions without you knowing it. One thing that you may all of a sudden find is that the interest rate that you will be getting at the moment may not be the same one that you will be getting later on in your life. Also you need to remember that home buying is different for everyone. The same techniques that your neighbor or parents may have used may not work out the same for you. But, one thing that you should always do is look at the house multiple times before you buy the home. Try to find anything that is broken or does not seem right and take pictures of it. This way when making your offer you can show why you think the house is worth the amount that you offered. Also try to make an appointment with the seller of the home so they can give you a tour of the house. While you are on the tour with the seller try to ask specific questions about the house like why they are selling the house, what certain rooms were used for, their favorite parts of the house, and if they had any pets. These are the types of questions that may end up help you deciding if you actually want to purchase the home. So, if you are looking for a new home just keep a positive attitude because sooner or later you will find a home that works for you and your family. Just do not get discouraged because it is a lot harder for an agent to work with a discouraged buyer because it makes their job harder for them. Good luck finding your new home. ReMax Southeast Denver Real Estate

Laundry room and guest room / mother-in-law room on walk out level. Master bedroom, 28ft. by 16 ft. with bay windows overlooking the river. Kitchen same size as master bedroom,with Magtag cook top stove and oven,GE stainless dishwasher,garbage disposal,stainless side by side Fridgedaire. Lots of cabinets and storage space, room for breakfast table in kitchen. Separate helpers room, with own entrance. Studio apt.on ground floor with own meter,kitchen and entrance. Two car attached garage and separate car port with storage room. Main floor has 14ft. ceilings, with special wall plaster (marbel look), marble tiles. Large lawn in back ideal for outdoor get-to-gethers, four section dog kennels and separate fruit tree area over looking river. Property is fenced, gate and steps lead to concrete area in river where you can sit, swim or wade in the river. River is used by tourist for rafting or inner tubing. Quiet street, near five star hotel, no water or power problems ( 9 houses on street) Asking Price: US$ 750,000

post.Title: Oakmount Townhouse for Rent
post.Content:
Its 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom upstairs, with another bedroom and bath on the main floor and another bedroom and bath in basement (can be used for older child or helper). So, this is a total of 5 bedrooms. Total of 3067 sq. ft. This is the only one like it in the complex (15 units altogether) and it is the largest. All the others are 2500+ square feet. Its at an end with 2 extra common car park spaces beside the unit. It comes with AC units in the 4 upper bedrooms and in the basement recreational area plus all lighting fixtures and fans. It has custom wood cabinetry, granite counter tops and undermount sinks in both kitchen and all bathrooms (except basement). Includes own 400 gallon water tank, water heater and full standby generator and pool for the complex. Maintenance of $24-25,000 still being finalized. We are asking J$48M for sale and US$3800 for rental

post.Title: Winefield, St Ann Residential Subdivision
post.Content:
Located in the cool valleys of St.Ann,approximately 3 miles after passing through the town of Claremont on the northern side of the main road is the entrance to “Winefield” a private residence, where the owner has an approved subdivision of 27 Agricultural Lots of about 5 acres each. The entire property comprises 167 acres and the subdivision covers about 130 acres. The existing residence is Lot 25 and Lot 26 & 27 is the water catchment, and Tank. Lot 21 is reserved for the property manager. The remaining lots;Lots 1 to 20 ,Lot 23 and 24 are available at J$5 Million each and are being sold as Agricultural Lots. Electricity is available on the main road. Access to the subdivision is located on the main road at the first entrance on the right immediately after the entrance to “Winefield” .

post.Title: Norbrook Townhouse for Rent
post.Content:
For Rent - Fully furnished Townhouse, Gwendon Park Estates. A superior new Townhouse in Norbrook. 3 Bedrooms, 3 1/2 Bathrooms plus Helper's Bed & bath Location: • Quiet Cul-de-sac in the prestigious Norbrook area, 1-3 Gwendon Park Avenue. Luxury development of only nine units attractively arranged. Features: • Gated Community, security 24/7 includes; electric gate and private central electronic King Alarm system for windows and doors. • Grounds professionally landscaped and maintained. • Attractive swimming pool. • Visitors’ parking. • Superb American-style floor plan of approximately 3,400 sq. ft. • Private covered two-car carport. • Elegantly furnished for owner’s use with no expense spared. Valuable art collection and Oriental Objects de Art. • All bedrooms and Family room / Study are air-conditioned. • Designer powder room. • Stunning Master Bedroom suite with grand dressing room, bathroom with separate shower and Jacuzzi tub and vanity counter with twin basins. • Two additional bedrooms with en suite bathrooms with bathtubs. • Helper’s bedroom and bathroom with private entrance. • Personal 16kw generator w/auto transfer and stand-by water supply. • Turn key - All major and minor appliances including Maytag dishwasher, washer and dryer. Vulcan six-burner stove. Sheets, towels, glassware, cutlery, etc. Accommodation, Arranged on two floors: • Ground Floor: Spacious his and her twin-carport with covered access to impressive Asian styled entry foyer leading to the powder room and family room. A short passage connects foyer to a picture-gallery stairwell and split-level billiard room, leading to large reception room for dining and living. Outside is an Ipe wood deck and garden with gazebo ideal for entertaining and barbecues. The service entrance off the carport leads to the kitchen, laundry and helper’s bed and bath rooms. • First Floor: Air-conditioned master bedroom suite. Two other air-conditioned bedrooms with en suite bathrooms. Available on a TWO YEAR LEASE as of 1st September 2012 and the rent is US $4,600.00 per month plus Maintenance

post.Title: Townhouse in Arcadia for Sale
post.Content:
Situated in the gated community of Arcadia Circle is this 2 storey Townhouse. Now tenanted but the occupant is aware that the property is offered for sale. Lower floor is accessed via an entrance door that opens to a small garden There are separate entrances for staff and owner. Main entrance opens to a foyer and powder room adjacent to the dining room The Kitchen is to the right and leads to the staff access with laundry, staff Bathroom and bedroom. The kitchen counter is an open floor plan ,which provides a breakfast counter. The living room is separated from the dining area by the stairway access to the upper floor. The Living room is spacious and a part of it now utilized as a work station. The doorway in the Living room area open on to a private courtyard. This area is mostly paved ,and is where the water tank is located. Upstairs is found 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, where the master bedroom ensuite. Also has a small covered balcony. Townhouse for Sale Listed at J$32 Million

post.Title: Norbrook Drive Executive Residence for Sale
post.Content:
This is an Executive type residence on over 1 ¼ acres with covered drive up front porch. Entrance foyer with elevated ceilings; access to the left is either separate formal living room, large dining room that opens to covered verandah; views of Kingston Harbour, and circular driveway below, large split level front lawns. Connected to Dining room are the spacious kitchen and extended family room which also communicates with the rear door entrance,to well fruited backyard behind cutstone and red brick walls to swimming pool terrace Gazebo with male and female bathrooms and bar area adjoining the pool terrace. There is another side patio /work area to another side of the kitchen which communicates with the Laundry; two Helpers rooms and a bath. Before taking you into the bedroom area access from the entrance foyer up 4 steps all on casted Terrazo flooring ,we take you back to the extensive den and family room which has another area close to the kitchen; is a breakfast room with circular dining table. A large guest bedroom and bath are located above, accessed via a spiral stairway. The Bed rooms are located up 4 steps, hallway with linen/storage closets on either side .Huge master bedroom with bay windows, large walk in closet, ensuite. Three other bedrooms, each with their own baths and built in cupboards. This is a well built structure, a bit dated ,but has tremendous appeal and easily updated. Values are also in the well fruited grounds, cutstone and boundary walls and fencing and other features better seen on inspection. Priced for Sale at U.Ss.$980k o.n.o.

The master bedroom has another patio which is quite spacious and provides views of Kingston and the surrounding Hills of Upper St.Andrew. post.Title: Farringdon Heights Residence for Sale
post.Content:
Location - Located in Kingston 6 with easy access to New Kingston, Liguanea and Hospitals and schools. Neighborhood - It is in a quiet well treed environment with no through roads. House Facts - Residence is a modem "timeless" architectural design on 3 levels with an open plan, bright and airy, with high ceilings throughout. Level 1 features an entry with a soothing waterfall with a fish and turtle pond set in a tropical landscape. Flowing from the entry is a sunken living area, a dining area with waterfalls, a large family room (with numerous possibilities), an open-plan kitchen with an interior garden and breakfast area, and also a private guest wing with own bathroom and a poolside view. In addition there are numerous store rooms, laundry area, helper's quarters with bathroom, an exterior bathroom with shower for gardener or security personnel. The house also features a large exterior terrace with "designer" grille work that opens unto a non-slip pool deck with a gazebo that is piped for music and has a view to the city. Level 2 consists 3 unique bedrooms with own bathrooms, two of the rooms features murals by Artist Michelle Guantlet and there is a private study at this level. The master bathroom features a sauna and a two (2) person Jacuzzi with his and her dressing areas, and ample closets. Level 2 also has an art gallery (or collection gallery) that is well lit and spacious. Level 3 has a roof entertainment area with a spectacular 180 degree view of St. Andrew and St.Catherine from Dallas Mountain to Stony Hill, and out to Port Royal and Caymanas Estate. This area is equipped with bar, Jacuzzi and cable outlets. Enclosed living space of 6,295 sf (585 sm.) Roof entertainment terrace of 688 sf. (64 sm.) Pool and pool deck of 1,607 sf. (149 sm.) Tiled Garage of 460 sf. (43 sm.) Total Residence Area - 9,050 sf. (841 sm.) Architectural Features - Floor to ceiling heights range from twelve feet (12'-0") up to twenty four feet at entry (24'-0"). Windows are large double glazed (cooler), decorative and secure grilles. Railings are customized with decorative glass panels. Main stairs features Jamaican Blue Mahoe treads with "Bellindo" design railings. Land Amenities - Sitting on 33,692 sf (0.78 acres) of land that is lush with gardens and many fruit trees. It also features a lawn in the front and a road sloping down to a level area that has great potential as a huge play area or landscaped gardens. General Amenities - Piled Foundations (better for Earthquakes). Sloping Concrete roof slabs (Hurricane proof). Solar water heater. Automatic Standby Generator with manual bypass. Water storage tank with pressure pump. Dusk to dawn external security lights. Electronic gate and walk foot gate with intercom system. Walled completely around for security. Professionally landscaped. Residential Luxury Features - This residence has been featured in the Sunday Observer under the "Decor" articles theme. The residence was also featured as the first Island Dreams "Dream House" TVJ Feature. Selling Price: US$1.6 Million

post.Title: Shortwood Road Townhouse for Rent
post.Content:
Please see photos of this available very well appointed Townhome in Briarwood complex. Diagonally opposite Stella Maris on Shortwood Road. Located on the western boundary, accessed at the end of the complexes driveway in well maintained and manicured garden is this 2 Storey Townhouse. Has a 2 car covered Parking with timber lattice work protecting the water storage tank and pressure pump and also provides a service entrance to the Laundry/Servants quarters with own bath etc. Main entrance door opens to a foyer with access to a large open style Kitchen well ventilated that looks down on to a sunken Dining Room and Living room areas .Glass panel doors open to an enclosed patio with grill work and grill door which provides access to an enclosed garden at rear. To the immediate right of the entrance foyer is a large room which could be used as a family room/den or another living room. There is also a powder room at this level The stairway leading upstairs has a landing in the middle where a window provides natural lighting and good air circulation. The stairs are protected by metal grills to one side and a security grill door. There are two separate bedrooms served by a second Bathroom on this floor; the large master bed room is ensuite, with a spacious walk-in storage /closet space; double sink bathroom with separate tub and shower enclosures. All bedrooms have good lighting and windows looking out over the Shortwood Greathouse lands now owned by the Bank Of Nova Scotia. Ideally located in a very well maintained complex which has mostly owners occupying townhomes; 24 hr. security; and very nice Pool and terraced area with Bar-B-Que Grill, male and female washrooms, an external shower all on a well laid out pool terrace/entertainment area. May be Leased on an annual basis, move in condition; may rented unfurnished; owner indicated she would supply furniture if required. Please call for appointment to inspect For Rent: US$2,100/Month

post.Title: Waterworks Townhouse for Sale
post.Content:
Completely renovated expanded and customized. Townhouse No. 4 Ground floor at entrance to this End Unit with access to the rear patio via a garden path from the front parking lot of this 26 Townhouse Gated complex in Waterworks, Manor Park, Kingston 8. To the right of the front door entrance is a completely remodeled Kitchen with custom cabinetry, separated from the Laundry area (Well lit by grilled skylight)There is also a staff Bathroom in this area. The entire ground floor was remodeled on one level with designer ceramic tiles which open onto a covered patio with access gate to the Garden on one side. All windows and Doors have painted wooden mouldings and there are lattice wooden window coolers with built in insect screens .A powder room is located under the stairwell, also a concealed storage compartment. The Stairways leading to the 1st floor and Loft area have been re-stained, sealed and polished. The master bedroom en suite with two separate cupboards accessed via sliding Mirrored doors ;extended master bedroom has ceiling fan, A/c split system and ceiling to floor tiled bathroom with Sliding shower enclosure customized Towel and wall fittings . Along the passage leading to the second bedroom is the Linen closet; the second bedroom has two enclosed cupboards and ceiling to floor tiled bathroom, sarked timber ceiling, a/c split system, ceiling fan and screened window cooler. The loft area on the top floor contains another large bedroom with walk in Closet, ceiling to floor tiled own Bathroom, all custom fittings, A/c split system ceiling Fan; also an A framed Sliding window providing views of the gardens below and the lower section of Stony hill access way. This completely remodeled unit is available for inspection now and we have been authorized to offer at U.S.$385k o.n.o

post.Title: Beverly Hills Executive Residence for Sale
post.Content:
Situated on 3/5 acre of land in a cul de sac this luxurious house offers the charm of formal and modern living. It is ideally suited for an executive with discerning taste and a flair for entertaining. The 6,000 square foot house comprises of three levels, the ground floor consists of a family room with a bar, wine cellar, entertainment area, powder room, shower and leads out to a well manicured lawn. The 2nd floor consists of 3 bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, a study overlooking the pool, a formal sitting area with marble tiles, a formal dining room, a wrap around balcony, large kitchen with center island and stainless steel appliances, a laundry room and a walk in pantry. This level leads to the pool area. The 3rd level consists of a large master bedroom suite with a sunken sitting area for TV, music, etc. The bathroom is completely tiled in marble, his and her sinks, jacuzzi, glass shower, bidet and toilet. Adjoining this area is a huge walk-in closet furnished with imported cabinetry and the entire 3rd floor is made of imported Brazilian redwood. The pool is tiled entirely with mosaics for aesthetic appeal, comfort and easy maintenance. the area has a bar, male and female toilets, shower and a large surrounding tiled area for entertaining. This area leads to a guest cottage on the hill. There are 2 staff rooms with en suite bathrooms, a 2-car garage with automatic door, a standby generator that runs the entire house including the pool and air-conditioners and 4 thousand gallons of reserve water with a pressured system. The lawns house a children's playground. Selling Price: To be advised Interested parties are invited to call us for more information and to set-up viewing appointment. Call (876) 946-2806

post.Title: Ambassadorial Residence, Stony Hill
post.Content:
The Estate occupies about 3.9 acres on prestigious Long Lane, Stony Hill, surrounded by appropriate walls and fencing including a gate house and comprises the main residence, a substantial swimming pool and adjacent pool house, various cottages and other buildings, a beautiful well maintained garden with orchids, hedges, lawns and developed trees and extensive outdoor entertaining areas. This most distinguished residence has been built and finished to an appropriately high standard and has recently been upgraded and modernized where appropriate and entirely redecorated. The main residence of 5325 sq. feet, of block and steel construction and tiled roof, has three large bedrooms all with modern en-suite bathrooms, a large formal lounge, a large majestic 16 seat dining room, a beautiful mahogany paneled study with powder room, a newly installed marble floor veranda and living area, a large and a small kitchen, a wine store and a laundry area. A feature of the Main Residence is the mahogany doors, skirtings, louvers and staircase banisters which have recently been restored to their former natural finishes. The main Guest Cottage of 1282 sq. feet, a short distance away from the Main Residence overlooks a large 700 sq. foot rectangular heated outdoor swimming pool with pumphouse and a 1620 sq. feet reinforced illuminated concrete sundeck. The Guest Cottage comprises two bedrooms each with a modern en-suite bathroom, sharing a sitting room, a kitchen and a breakfast area. There are two other separate Accommodation buildings, 1044 sq. feet and 500 sq. feet for six additional guests and staff, both with bathroom and kitchen facilities. There is a paved and covered outside entertainment Gazebo, Barbeque and Patio area totaling about 730 sq. feet extending from the Main Residence near to the pool area. There is a two car garage, an emergency water storage tank with a 2500 gallon capacity and a generator room with an 80 KVA generator room and 500 gallon fuel tank. Recent restoration work has included an entire repainting and redecorating, any required repair or restoration of roof tiles, guttering, electrics, walling and paving and the replacement of all awnings. This is once in a lifetime opportunity as a family home or residential compound, a corporate headquarters, a suburban medical centre, or as a development opportunity to ring fence and maintain the elegant Main Residence and use three acres of the property for house, townhouse or cottage development similar to the neighbouring Gleneagles development. Selling Price: US$3.5 Million

post.Title: Milverton Crescent Residence For Sale
post.Content:
Located on a quiet cul-de-sac off Karachi Avenue is this single storey dwelling in an affluent neighborhood with Doctors residences on either side. Architectural features includes elevated tray ceilings with wall and ceiling mouldings and Columns on the internal and external areas at the main entrance and at the front of the formal dining room. A Large formal sitting room has a separate Guest bedroom/study/with designer type shower enclosure attached. The formal dining room is located on the same side which communicates with a customized Kitchen which also has access to the Family room attached and communicating with the Living room and Bedroom area is linked from a passageway which leads to the master Bedroom ensuite and 3 other bedrooms each with their own bathroom. Attached to the main kitchen is a staff kitchen which is adjacent to the Laundry, Staff bedroom and Bathroom. External doorway opens to an enclosed drying yard which leads via an archway entrance to the paved courtyard. This courtyard is accessed from the covered verandah protected by Metal grills which protects the family room from the rear section of the property. All Boundary walls are textured concrete with columns at 8 and 16 foot centres. At the front is a 2 car covered carport which has a separate entrance to the Guest bedroom in front .There is a secured storeroom in the northern side of the carport. This well designed and aesthetically laid out residence is Listed at $40 Million, must be viewed to be appreciated with marble flooring at sections. Owner is down sizing and will consider a reasonable offer.

post.Title: Hellshire, St Catherine Home for Sale
post.Content:
PRICE REDUCED - Call for more info: (876) 371-3170 Located on the sea overlooking a private cove adjacent to Hellshire Beach is this 2 storey residence surrounded by boundary walls and accessed via a double leaf timber gate on a paved driveway and enclosed large parking area. Grand entry to foyer which looks down into a sunken living room. Immediately to the left of the entrance way is a Powder room that leads to a large family/media room which has both split A/C system and ceiling fans, together with surround sound stereo system. On the opposite side of the entrance way is a stairway leading to up stairs, and an access way to a Large Kitchen with island and all appliances of a modern Kitchen. The formal Dining Room is separated from the Kitchen by a spacious Breakfast counter. Step Down to the Living Room which has two separate wings, the right side leads to two Bedrooms each with sea views from their respective windows, and a Bathroom On this side of the living Room is access to the laundry and storage area also with a separate door leading to outside, for Staff. The Staff Room and Bathroom is located adjacent to the Laundry area, also accessed from outside. To the left of the Living room is a separate Bedroom with own Bathroom. This bedroom has 2 windows with views of the sea. All bedrooms have split A/C systems. To the right of the main entrance is the stairway leading to the Master Suite which has a huge walk in closet and a huge Bathroom with shower enclosure and a deluxe Double position Whirlpool bath. This master suite has a walk out Balcony behind sliding doors and plate glass windows. All external doors and windows are secured by window Grills. Accessed via the living room sliding doors is the large Swimming pool surrounded by Paved and tiled Pool terrace which leads on to a covered patio with Timber flooring attached and adjoining the tiled pool terrace. On both sides of the pool Terrace which has great sea views from all angles are steps leading down to the Garden area. Also shown in the photos is a new Open fisherman type Boat and Trailer included in the package. A very unique residential opportunity on the sea at Hellshire in an excellent neighborhood ("The Norbrook of St.Catherine") Priced has been reduced. Call for more info: (876) 371-3170

post.Title: Villa for Sale in Ocho Rios
post.Content:
Castle on the Sea
TOTALLY UNIQUE twin fairy tale like seaside Castles, in a secure electronic gated estate, offering ultimate tropical splendor with TOTAL PRIVACY, be it one, or up to 12 guests, the ENTIRE PROPERTY is rented ONLY to one set of guests at a time, in a seeing is believing Caribbean setting, with numerous waterfalls, fishponds, fountains, flowers & multi-fruited gardens, tiki torches and enchanting sunsets, this Eden should satisfy any Adam or Eve. Your gourmet meals will be prepared by your PRIVATE CHEF on site. In a lush garden setting which overlooks both the Caribbean and many splashing fishponds and fountains, is a state of art hydro-jet 7 person heated Jacuzzi like spa, with double waterfalls, CD stereo with pop up speaker system, and a satellite stereo. The Jacuzzi's are totally drained and cleaned prior to each new guests arrival. Castle and Chateau's swimming pools both employ a unique Nature 2 filtering system, which enables them to be always crystal clear with little use or need of chlorine or other chemicals. *No red eyes or chlorine enhanced skin infections. Amenities Being sold as a going concern. Christmas and New Year's Weekly rates are: US$8,500 for up to 8 guests. post.Title: Manor Park Townhouse for Lease
post.Content:
Secured and well maintained complex in Manor Park area.

Completely furnished and equipped 2 Storey with Basement TownHouse. High end furnishings fittings and equipment are 220 volt. Entry Level Powder Room to the left and further in on the opposite side is a brand new Kitchen all stainless steel Appliances; quality cutlery and crockery Dining room off the kitchen and step down to Living room, halogen lighting; ceiling fan and A/C split system. The Living Room door opens on to a Slate tiled patio which provides views of the Golf Course;and also the Swimming Pool and Tennis Court which are in close proximity. Upper Floor: Two Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms, executive Furnishings and linens throughout; Bedroom have tray ceilings , ceiling fans and A/C wall units. Basement has a separate Laundry Room with Washer and Dryer, hot water heater located here. The Basement is a large sitting room exquisitely furnished with adjoining bathroom, tray ceiling, ceiling fan and A/C unit. The couch converts to a Double Bed. The exterior double doors open onto a covered wooden Deck which has a wet bar. This deck provides access to the small backyard where the water tank and pressure pump are located. Unit is Listed at U.S.$3000 per month inclusive of maintenance (tenant to pay for electric, cable and telephone)

post.Title: Belgrade Heights, St. Andrew Residence for Sale
post.Content:
Belgrade Heights, St. Andrew: Residence For Sale

Three bedrooms home nestled comfortably in the hills of Belgrade Heights with lots of large living spaces. The entry level features a carport, large open plan living room, family room, study, powder room and balconies which offer a breathtaking 180 degree view of the city and sea. Walk up the connecting staircase to the upper level and the large master bedroom suite. Two other bedrooms, one other bathroom, living room, dining, very large kitchen with lots of cupboard space, balconies and laundry complete the amenities on this level. post.Title: Ocho Rios House for Sale
post.Content:
ATTRACTIVE DWELLING WITH INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY IN OCHO RIOS, ST ANN

This home is situated in the River Oaks community which affords amenities such as a clubhouse, tennis court and swimming pool. Three bedrooms three bathrooms residence in the Exchange area of Ocho Rios, (River Oaks) affording such community amenities as a clubhouse, tennis court and swimming pool. The “mansion like” properties of the home feature first class finishes and/or ideas eg a combination of French and serpentine cedar windows, drywall ceilings (all over 9 ft high), decra shake roof with concrete slab, top of the line floor tiles etc. Koi and lily ponds at the front entrance add to the ambiance of this mansion fit for a king. There is also a one-bedroom flat complete with kitchen, laundry area, living and dining rooms, potentially usable as a bed and breakfast accommodation (So it is a great dwelling for the prospective owner with an investment/income opportunity as well). All interior and exterior doors are 8 feet high cedar raised panel doors. This house of approx 4,100 sq ft, is near ninety per cent complete. It sits on a one third acre lot of land. post.Title: Chateau En Exotica - Villa for Sale
post.Content:
Chateau en Exotica, San San Estate, Portland

Located on a private ridge overlooking Alligator head and San San beach is this villa that was designed by Marvin Goodman, which is a split level resort bldg on 5 acres. It's all on the same level, bedrooms on same level. 3 bedrooms ensuite with walk-in closets separate a/c and ceiling fans in each. Large Master bedroom, dressing area, on Left wing with 2 other bedrooms ensuite. On the right wing is separate living and dining rooms connected by entrance foyer. Communicates with a spacious kitchen, fully equipped with pantry. A stairway from the living room leads to another bedroom with its own bath and an extra guestroom. Dining/living area open to a covered access patio overlooking the pool, wet bar and separate hot tub. The villa is fully equipped, furnished, includes furniture and equipment and wall hangings. Inclusive of 2 convertible sofas. Additional features: There's an external whirlpool bath and massage area. Adjacent to the entrance walkway which is fully landscaped and gardens are in manicured condition. Full Internet & Phone Staff 2 housekeepers, chef, a butler/houseman who stays on the property as a caretaker. In-season rates are on Trip Advisor. Average occupancy is approx 50% per year. The sale price: inclusive of all (US$1.5 million) Separate contracts for the Realty and Contents. For further info and inquiry to inspect please call broker: (876) 371-3170

post.Title: [Price Reduced] Hotel Mockingbird Hill for Sale
post.Content:
Hotel Mockingbird Hill, Port Antonio for Sale
7.5 acres of land with extensive terraced tropical organic gardens including a kitchen garden Garden deck for yoga, bird watching and relaxing Well-being spa area with large water landscape feature Swimming pool with pool deck and gazebo Private entrance at the top of a private road Car park with space for 12 cars Jamaica’s most well-known and popular eco-boutique hotel has had a successful trading performance for more than 23 years. 2010 saw the hotel win Virgin Travel & Responsible Tourism’s “Best Hotel for the Environment” award at the World Travel Market London. 3 BUILDINGS The main building consisting of the public areas (lounge/ bar/perch/public toilets/dining terrace/office/2 public toilets as well as back of house area with kitchen/stores and pump room and 1 staff quarters) and 6 en-suite bedrooms • Adjacent building with 4 en-suite bedrooms • “Gallery” with large space below that can be utilised for meetings, seminar or as exhibition space and 1 large living/bedroom and bathroom upstairs for resident manager (unfurnished) • Extra garden/maintenance storeroom • Staff lunch & rest area and 2 separate staff bathrooms for men/women. (The pool surface was re done in October 2014. This surfacing should last 10 years. The sand filter for the pool was changed in October 2015 and should last for at least 3 years.) All rooms and public areas are fully furnished including a full inventory of kitchen/restaurant and room supplies. All 8 lots are contiguous and registered under one property valuation number so that significantly less property tax is required to be paid. FIXTURES AND FITTINGS The hotel is being offered for sale as a furnished and equipped trading business. A full inventory is available on request. STAFF The hotel is operated with a full complement of staff including: 1 Kitchen Staff 1 General Assistant (helps with housekeeping/ kitchen or maintenance as required) 2 Housekeepers, 1 Service Assistant (Casual) 2 Maintenance, 3 Landscape Gardeners. All staff members have been trained to multitask to allow them offer assistance as required on the property. The owners currently fulfil Reservations, Sales & Marketing, Management and Chef roles. A full Staffing Schedule is available on request. REDEVELOPMENT The property itself is large enough and the flat tracts of land under the pool provide the potential to be able to build more rooms and therefore offset the main costs occurring from the public are-as. Additionally, the land lying adjacent to the property on the opposite side of the road leading to the property can be bought as well as the 4-bedroom villa at the bottom of the property This could be used either as staff quarters for management and/or offices or as additional rooms or as a villa. The potential to develop and expand on what has already been established to date is immense. Special offer / Price Reduced on this turn key opportunity for potential Investors: USD$2.98 Million In addition we are flexible to provide a sellers or vendors mortgage so that only 50-60% need be paid now and the balance over an agreed period of time. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- For inquiries, contact Anthony Harris @ (876) 371-3170 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

post.Title: Seaview Villa, Port Antonio for Sale
post.Content:
Seaview Villa, Port Antonio Vacation Property for Sale
[caption id="attachment_4489" align="aligncenter" width="600"] A 2 hour drive from Kingston and a 4 hour drive from Montego Bay.[/caption] The exclusive private Sea View Villa is one of the most glamorous, luxury, vacation rental properties in Jamaica. A modern waterfront residence, nestled on the coast of Jamaica, next to the spectacular turquoise waters of Port Antonio. A truly remarkable Caribbean holiday resort....an enchanting heaven. Guests have an uninterrupted stunning 180 degree view of the Caribbean Sea. Seaview Villa offers the perfect choice for Jamaican lodging. Spacious rooms where you can unwind after a busy day of shopping or sightseeing the many wonders of Jamaica. Take a dip in our beautiful swimming pool or relax in our jacuzzi. Pool loungers are available for you to relax. Seaview Villa is only a 6 to 7 minutes drive from the world’s famous Frenchman’s Cove Beach and Blue Lagoon. Enjoy the adventure, go kayaking over to nearby Monkey Island. Visit the beautiful haven, Port Antonio. This unique black & white villa boasts top of the line sophistication, style and class. The villa's architectural design is reminiscent of a black and white Salvador Dali architectural painting full of Rubik nuances. Inside and outside black and white is the theme. This holiday home is distinguished by world class architecture, design and decor, breathtaking location and exquisite accommodations and service. ---- Asking Price: USD$2.1 Million --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- For inquiries, contact Anthony Harris @ (876) 371-3170 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Efficiently designed and immaculately maintained split level home of three bedrooms, four and a half bathrooms, Jacuzzi, living room, family room, office space, kitchen, double carport, extensive asphalted driveway, helpers’ quarters, internal laundry, with a breathtaking view of the city and sea.
